steps.text: Peel and chop onions into very small pieces (pea-size).
Wash and dice tomatoes into small cubes (Ludo dice size).
Peel and cut potatoes into medium cubes (sugar-cube size).
Remove capsicum seeds and chop into small cubes.
Cut cauliflower into small florets (thumb-nail size).
Boil potatoes, cauliflower, peas in pressure cooker for 3 whistles.
In a pan, heat oil and butter; sauté onions till light brown, add ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook until soft and mushy.
Add boiled veggies and mash with masher; add 0.5–1 cup water, simmer 10 minutes.
Toast pav on tawa with butter until golden; serve with bhaji, chopped onion and lemon.
